short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Accompanies The Hello POS. Used to enable printing on your thermal receipt printers, plus some other goodies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Made for users of The Hello POS. Required for printing receipts from your register. 

Check the help articles if you have troubles getting it to work.
